text:
Unic AG | PHP Magento Akeneo Symfony | Zurich, Switzerland | Full-time, ONSITE

At Unic, you will help national and international customers to realise sophisticated e-business projects. And you will work with 200 experts, professionals and top specialists from across all the Unic sites: these people are the reason why Unic is the leading independent provider of e-business solutions.

I'm afraid but job description is in German https://www.unic.com/en/about/career/jobs/
